page.title: 10Sports Facilities at Stone
page.content: Stone Golf Club is situated next to the A34 near to the railway.To join the Golf Club it is 140 pounds a year.It is 6 pounds for a round whch includes going into the Club and watching television etc.Stone Lawn Tennis and squash Club is situated on the Newcastle road.If you are a member,the tennis courts are free.The membership costs 15 pounds for children and 25 pounds for adults. The squash courts are free but you pay for the lights.There are three shale courts, three all weather courts and one tarmac court. The Stone Crown Bowling Club is situated in Crown Street.Stone Alleynes Sports Centre is situated in the Oulton Road.Junior swimming is 45p.and adult swimming costs 75p. The squash courts cost 1 pound 75 pence to hire per session.The Stafford & Stone Canoe Club is a national centre.
